DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to built the standard of Chinese Traditional Medicine test for Post percutaneous coronary artery intervention and coronary artery bypass graft，also for acute coronary syndrome，according to the multi－site、random large sample test.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Chinese Traditional Medicine for Post Revascularization Treatment of Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: age40～75 angina or CAD patient deficiency of heartQI and blockage of phlegm and blood stasis in chinese medicine 1 week after operation，or 1week after drainage tube extraction for CABG sign a informed consent severe cardia failure severe renal inadequacy complicating with malignant tumor,reactive alimentary tract hemorrhage and haematological systemic disorder etc. psychotic pregnant,lactation
